ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Troll SK - Looking for Hunting Grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: You normally can go there at 11, 12 and work the yard trash.  I actually love that place but its good for PL ng not so much for soloing because of the trains.
ygData.messageBody:
You normally can go there at 11, 12 and work the yard
trash. I actually love that place but its good for
PL'ng not so much for soloing because of the trains.
If you can get a higher level to wipe stuff out and
get a good spot inside you can do well in there for
exp

All suggestions so far are excellent. Paludal is
nice, Unrest, Befallen, Kurns, etc


Good luck

--- Scott Monsour <b08sam@...> wrote:

> How about the Unrest Estates? What level should one
> feel comfortable
> hunting in that location?
>
> Thanks
>
> Scott
>
>
>
